chapter.title: Check the status and progress of your plan

section.title: Glance at the progress of your objective
section.p: Mingle Plus makes it easy to quickly check the status and progress of your program's plan using three primary indicators:

bullets.item: Work count ratio: Mingle Plus provides a ratio of work items complete to total work items on each objective in your program's plan:
bullets.note: Mingle Plus currently supports work item count only; it does not currently support sum of story point estimates.
bullets.item: Project progress bar: Drilling into your objective, you can see how work items are distributed across projects and how much progress has been made in each project:

Alerts: Mingle Plus provides alerts when an objective has been running for more than 10% of its planned duration, and a project within that objective is either forecasted to be late or has not yet started.

section.title: Check for schedule changes
section.p: Mingle Plus helps you check for schedule changes by forecasting when a project may complete. Using total average velocity to date, we generate forecasts about your project's likelihood to be late in three scenarios: no scope change, 50% increase in scope, and 150% increase in scope. Alerts are triggered if your project is forecasted to finish late with no change in scope.

section.title: View work in an objective
section.p: To view the status of work in your objective, click on the “View Work” button on your objective pop-over. You can filter your view to focus on work from a specific project or on status.
